Title: Requires milled roads within a city having a population of one million or more be paved over or resurfaced within seventy-two hours of such road being milled
Summary: Requires milled roads within a city having a population of one million or more be paved over or resurfaced within seventy-two hours of such road being milled.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to requiring milled roads within a city having a population of one million or more be paved over or resurfaced within seventy-two hours of such road being milled
